recipes.title: Normal Recipe
recipes.subtitle: it's pretty good

instructions.text: Crumble ground chuck and sausage into a large stock pot. Cook, stirring frequently, until meat is evenly browned. Drain off excess grease.
Add in remaining ingredients. Stir to blend, then cover and simmer over low heat for at least 2 hours, stirring occasionally.
